MAIN_CONTENT.TITLE: What is ngx-translate?
MAIN_CONTENT.DESC_P1: NGX-Translate is an internationalization library for Angular. It lets you define translations for your content in different languages and switch between them easily.
MAIN_CONTENT.DESC_P2: It gives you access to a service, a directive and a pipe to handle any dynamic or static content.
MAIN_CONTENT.DESC_P3: NGX-Translate is also extremely modular. It is written in a way that makes it really easy to replace any part with a custom implementation in case the existing one doesn't fit your needs.
